Message 2895 of 4024
Unless we have to solve the deck or the credit cards today, AND you meet with Kari soon, I can put this off till you do. Thoughts?
Sent:05/28/2024 at 02:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Karri’s Mail
Message 2896 of 4024
Well... we had plans to talk last week. You asked to put it off five days. I did not bat after you refused to divulge the location of our children over the
long holiday. Just like over spring break. No surprise.
I was open to moving it, but wanted to touch base here as Kari’s response was one of the topics. So hyper appropriate to OFW dialog. But it’s been
over24 hours since you bothered checking in.
Sent:05/28/2024 at 09:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Karri’s Mail

I keep trying to extend an olive branch for the health and well being of our children. Not only are those regular offers not considered, you don’t
bother flowing through on base line communications.
Message 2897 of 4024
Do you have the kid’s scheduled? If they are not in this week, she is out next week. Everything takes a month just to get started. Or several in the case
of Dr Brown and Kari. And we are into our second summer now. I feel like this is very unhealthy for the boys and it feels like you are pretty checked
out these days.
Sent:05/28/2024 at 10:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 01:59 PM)
Subject:Re: Karri’s Mail
Message 2898 of 4024
- July, you abdicated your responsibilities as a parent with me
- December, you abstained from all co-parenting with me
- May, you have withdrawn from any parallel parenting efforts
- We had agreed to talk last week
- We agreed to follow up yesterday
- You have done neither and are dark
- You refuse to tell me where our kids are
- Won't tell me if they will see Jennifer Kellin
- I can't reach anyone in the house at this point
- You have inquired about moving out of state
I have no idea if you and the kids are dead or alive. You could all be deceased from carbon monoxide poisoning, and I'd never know. You might have
moved forward with your ideas to take them out of state or the country as noted with Dr Brown.
You refuse to coordinate on anything related to their mental health. You also keep all my prescriptions sent to Kirkland a secret and refuse to give
them to me so I can follow doctors' orders. Not having my medications is causing health issues.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 12:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 01:59 PM)
Subject:Severing All Contact
Message 2899 of 4024
She just asked to schedule you and I. I did not see a request to schedule the kids at this point.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 02:00 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Karri’s Mail

Message 2900 of 4024
Thanks for letting me know.
I had reached out to Robyn on her birthday and not heard back. When I reached out to Beth a while back the response was strange.
I am not aware what has been communicated to them but it appears they are keeping their distance so I will respect that.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 02:03 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:04 PM)
Subject:Re: Anniversary & Reunification
Message 2901 of 4024
Yeah. When we put the hones on the therapist, they don’t get in. That was the same reason that AD did not get in to see Kari a couple of weeks ago
after a particularly emotional event. You said it was on Kari. So it did not happen. If you’re in charge of the kids schedule and their mental health, I
would suggest taking a more proactive role.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 02:04 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:04 PM)
Subject:Re: Karri’s Mail
Message 2902 of 4024
Please update your medication address. Another bag arrived which I will give to Alan on Sunday for delivery just like last time.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 02:06 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 02:07 PM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact
Message 2903 of 4024
I have updated it. I’ve also updated the post office forwarding address. And as a result, your mail for Starbucks Insurance comes to me. So I alerted
you immediately to help.
I think the reality of our situation isthat this is not an infallible process. So if you feel you’re incapable of accommodating those scenario I guess we
should speak to our attorneys.

From:Robert Moyer

are you calling me?

We got off to a bad start. You keep hanging up. Let's please start this over and be constructive.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 04:28 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 06:05 PM)
Subject:Re:  Chat
Message 2909 of 4024
Thank you! I am fully supportive of the pause so you can do your thing at 5:00.
We were having a peaceful and constructive conversation in the best interest of our children, which I'd like to continue. Let's stay positive, and if we
cross into something we disagree on, stop and move on. That is what we did after some initial fits and starts. It was working.
So let's just keep doing that. Can we continue after you focus on your work meeting?
Sent:05/29/2024 at 05:09 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/29/2024 at 06:05 PM)
Subject:Re:  Chat

Sent:05/29/2024 at 06:22 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 03:45 AM)
Subject:Re:  Chat
Message 2911 of 4024
Why did you hang up again? I had not even said anything? Why would you do that?
Sent:05/29/2024 at 08:43 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 03:45 AM)
Subject:Re:  Chat
Message 2912 of 4024
You have disabled our single agreed-upon communication plan about the kid's best interests.
I told you yesterday that I was very concerned about the blackout you had initiated. We had a good discussion and then you responded by doubling
down.
Now, there is no zero way to communicate for urgent situations and emergencies, even with the extremely limited minutes that we have allotted on

What are next steps? I want to work constructively with you and have asked for a peaceful solution.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 08:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 03:44 AM)
Subject:Our Communication Plan
Message 2913 of 4024
Your response to my concern’s attached ...you asked that I take you to court today if I ever want to know about my kids. I am hoping for a more
peaceful and constructive solution than your proposal.
Sent:05/29/2024 at 08:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 03:43 AM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact
Attachments:IMG_0506.PNG (226 KB)
Message 2914 of 4024
You twist my words.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 03:44 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 06:55 AM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact

See repeated harassing calls after I tell you I felt unsafe with the conversation and your yelling and screaming.
Message 2915 of 4024
See repeated harassing phone calls.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 03:45 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 06:56 AM)
Subject:Re: Our Communication Plan
Message 2916 of 4024
I disagree with your assessment, and in fact, I shared my contemporaneous notes so we could edit/update if, in any case, I had transcribed anything
inaccurately. My sole intention was to align.
Yesterday, we practiced using the "parking lot" when we disagreed, and while it was difficult, I think it worked. This feels like a great opportunity to
flex that muscle and de-escalate this topic.
You have access to all my real-time notes. As mentioned, I'll incorporate any edits or updates you suggest. I value our collaboration and hope that we
can reach some mutual understanding.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 09:16 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 10:06 AM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact
Message 2917 of 4024
I want to get this back on track and hope I misconstrued your ask to be taken to court.
As noted below, I'd like to understand your thoughts on how to do that w/o that route.
Please just let me know. I am here to partner cooperatively with you for the boy's sake.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 09:19 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 10:09 AM)
Subject:Re: Our Communication Plan
Message 2918 of 4024
This is why engaging in a conversation is unhelpful. It does not convey the level of aggression and anger and repeated revisiting of topics that I tell you
make me feel uncomfortable.
Below is not an accurate assessment of how the discussion went.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 10:09 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 10:34 AM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact

Message 2919 of 4024
Again, twisted my words. I can’t engage in a discussion as this is the result.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 10:10 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 10:30 AM)
Subject:Re: Our Communication Plan
Message 2920 of 4024
I am asking repeatedly for you to tell me what you said then. I know what I heard. I typed it as you said it.
But let’s try something new. How about you send the notes and then we can start from those instead?
Looking for any solutions other than “there are no solutions” We need to do better for the kids here.
I am all ears and willing to give anything a try.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 10:34 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 01:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Our Communication Plan
Message 2921 of 4024
Please don’t give up on doing the right things for our boys. We can mine OFW for tens of the reasons given to always quit trying and never make an
effort.
I have suggested a more peaceful solution. If you are unwilling to try that, please offer an alternative. I am being very clear that I want your input,
repeatedly.
If you tare unwilling to engage at all, even of your own suggestion, I am unsure how to help our kids. Please take a moment to offer a constructive
solution.
More time is spent saying “no way” than simply offering an alternative. Please give cooperation a fighting chance. I want to work with you here.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 10:42 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 01:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Severing All Contact
Message 2922 of 4024
Obviously the same bldg as Debbie and Kari.
Second floor, as you face towards the front of the bldg upstairs, it’s on your left in a group of a few offices. Should be easy enough to find.
Telling ya, I thought I punched in the wrong address as I got close. Then I realized it was the same place for all those shrinks. That is crazy tbh.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 01:23 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 01:32 PM)
Subject:Jennifer

Start with coparenting there. If you fail, your kids will need their own therapist. Got that. If you still can’t get it together, reunification is up. Got that
too.
They literally have the full lifecycle for each stage of divorce as a marriage gets blown up and the family falls apart. Crazy it’s a linear one stop shop.
Good luck! I know we are both bought in.
Message 2923 of 4024
I do not see any response to our discussion, and I have zero way to communicate now. Nothing.
I don't want to argue about whether you said I would have to go to court to communicate. If you say you did not, fine. I don't want to anyway. But -
I need a way to communicate with you if you are asserting 100% control of our kids. Absent due process, I have a legitimate reason to want to know
about Max and Adrian's wellfare.
No matter what happens in reunification, with the GAL, or in the Mediation process, no one will frown on us trying to work peacefully and
constructively together in the Kid's best interest. That is what they hope to see. Everything I have read and heard so far regards that favorably. So I am
asking you to propose how we do that.
Please enable calls or let me know when we can chat. I assure you 100% this will be safe and peaceful. I can not emphasize that more. I have zero
interest in doing anything that will make this any worse. I also hope we will both acknowledge that it takes two people to argue and do our best not to
let that happen when we chat.
Please let me know. I want to be constructive and am pleading with you to solve this together.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 03:54 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 04:07 PM)
Subject:When can we Chat?
Message 2924 of 4024
I was reviewing list and don’t see any optics that require a conversation.
Met with Jennifer today and she’s asking I schedule additional meeting to include kids and I, which I will do.

Adrian’s friends are attending and parents told me about it. Adrian is interested in attending. Any objection?

From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Sailing trip SAAS

Message 2926 of 4024
Please do not gatekeep. You have a different bar because you have the kids 100%. So you are not operating from the same place. Let’s chat please.

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 04:16 PM)

Message 2927 of 4024
There are no dates in the email. I have zero idea what it is about. I’d like to chat like we did for Max’s trip. In the end that helped get him the life saving
equipment that he needed. Let me know when we can discuss.
Sent:05/30/2024 at 04:14 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Sent:05/30/2024 at 04:19 PM

Message 2929 of 4024
Invite updated. You are doing all your calls that way anyway so let’s just stick to it. Hopefully it will help us so we are not talking all over each other.
That was literally what killed us yesterday, along with starting every single convo with some negative prelude. So let’s please just avoid both and share
some grace!
Sent:05/30/2024 at 05:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Sent:05/30/2024 at 07:36 PM

To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/30/2024 at 07:38 PM)
Subject:Re: When can we Chat?
Message 2932 of 4024
Please call back.
I did not have an option you hung up as always.
I am asking to work constructively with you again
Sent:05/30/2024 at 07:38 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 07:35 AM)
Subject:Re: When can we Chat?
Message 2933 of 4024
I just spent the evening documenting. We both have a lot of narratives that we might choose to tear each other down, but I think you will be pretty
surprised by what our texts say day by day.
Example: You may feel you have a pretty good case for gatekeeping and parental alienation, but it was not for safety. You confirmed it is just a legal
strategy from your 3rd lawyer in Oct.
We have both repeated so many things so many times we believe them. However, the actual texts do not support many of those narratives. They are
contradicted by our own words.
My meta point is that neither the GAL or Mediator can make a legal judgment of guilt. They only make recommendations. So I'm not sure what the
end game is for tearing each other down.
I'd like to have a peaceful discussion about working together and arresting the long-term damage we are doing to the kids for what is, at best, a costly,
near-term, destructive, and selfish victory.
Let's get our heads together now, not later, to stop the senseless damage we are doing to our children. The people we work with next will want to see
that and appreciate our efforts if we do.
We spun out of control way too fast. It's too bad, but we don't need to make this worse.
Sent:05/31/2024 at 12:21 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 07:34 AM)
Subject:Should we Chat

Message 2934 of 4024
Any thoughts?
I want to be transparent about my attempt here. I feel like we’ve outsourced our entire family to an industry. We’ve gone through more therapist,
parenting, plans, and lawyers than we have fingers and toes. You and I are worse than we’ve ever been. and we have seen the impact on the kids and
their relationships with me.
This is absolutely the opposite of what we had had envisioned when we started this. I’m not bugging you to chat today. But I am trying to plant the
seed to perhaps over the weekend have the discussion. You know I read voraciously. And lately a lot of my focus has been on the impact of the
“divorce business” on real families with real challenges. It’s not good.
You may disagree and think all this has been positive, and that’s your prerogative, but after we chat, perhaps you talk to your divorce crew and get
their honest perspective. I’m guessing, but I doubt there will be a lot of positive feedback on the “business of divorce” and many of the people paying
for private schools working in it. It’s a meme for a reason. It’s a real thing.
Want to take a timeout, step up to the balcony for a moment and assess what’s happening on the dance floor? It can’t hurt us to have the
conversation.
Sent:05/31/2024 at 10:32 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 12:08 PM)
Subject:Re: Should we Chat
Message 2935 of 4024

communicate?

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 06:36 PM)
Subject:Re: Should we Chat

Why don’t I have a way to reach you?

Sent:05/31/2024 at 06:39 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Re: Who is at hoops with Adrian ?

Message 2943 of 4024

Sent:05/31/2024 at 06:40 PM

Subject:Re: Should we Chat

Sent:05/31/2024 at 06:49 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 06:50 PM)
Subject:Re: Who is at hoops with Adrian ?
Message 2945 of 4024
How are you dealing with it?
Do you think he would benefit from having me involved given we have done this his whole life together. This is not the first or last time it’s
happened. How can I help since you don’t have any experience doing this?
Sent:05/31/2024 at 06:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 08:39 PM)
Subject:Re: Who is at hoops with Adrian ?
Message 2946 of 4024
You misunderstood everything I said. We do that a lot.
Let’s cool off and revisit this. When you said you were just gonna “tell everyone the truth” my point was we were a married couple. They have no
business, knowing what the truth is. That was our own private business.
Creating enemies of our families does not help our kids. I don’t want you to be my enemy and I don’t want your family to be my enemy and I would
like my family to have a good relationship with you.
So with that in mind, let’s just please cool off . we are both triggered and we can have this discussion some other time. Let’s don’t make a
misunderstanding, even worse.
Have a great night
Sent:05/31/2024 at 07:39 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 05/31/2024 at 08:39 PM)
Subject:I am not fighting , let’s cool off , ok?

Message 2947 of 4024
Great discussion. Very healthy and AD focused.
Hope we can pattern more after that interaction.
He depends on us. Let’s get our shit together.
Have a great night!
Sent:05/31/2024 at 10:21 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/01/2024 at 09:13 AM)
Subject:Re: Who is at hoops with Adrian ?
Message 2948 of 4024
Good Morning!
I’d like to try something new! Sometimes it feels like we are in a battle zone and wake up each day wondering when the next grenade will land.
Soooo... I am checking in peacefully ahead of time to wave the white flag from my trench as we get started. I don’t have anything pressing to chat
about.
My offer for a strategic pause still stands. We could really use a larger pause and honestly some professional intervention, but I can’t do that alone.
So no complaints, bitching, arguing to ruin your day! Let’s just keep our “cooling off” from yesterday rolling. If you need me, I’m here to help in any
way!
Best
-robert
Sent:06/01/2024 at 06:34 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/01/2024 at 09:13 AM)
Subject:Saturday

Nothing important from me and we both enjoyed the peace and quiet yesterday, so let’s try it again!
Please let me know if there’s anything I can do for you today as we coordinate schedules for him.
Have a great day !
-robert

thanks
Sent:06/03/2024 at 12:15 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/03/2024 at 12:27 PM)
Subject:Re: Draft stipulation and order
Message 2956 of 4024
Sticking to OFW
Boys are schedule with Jennifer June 13.
Adrian signed up and confirmed for sailing. I completed the paperwork.
Study skills, Max confirmed English was turned in and will follow up tomorrow. Adrian will see his English teacher tomorrow.
